headline: Howmet Aerospace (NYSE:HWM) Reports First-Quarter Earnings Rise to US$344 Million
summary: Howmet Aerospace (NYSE:HWM) recently announced impressive first-quarter earnings, with sales rising to $1,942 million and net income jumping to $344 million, both showing significant year-over-year increases. The company also revised its full-year revenue guidance upwards and reported continued share repurchases, adding further optimism. Over the last month, the company's price moved up by 37%, a substantial increase compared to the broader market's 3% rise in the last week and 10% over the...
